name: sheitel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a wig (= a covering of artificial hair) worn by some Jewish married women: Many Orthodox women wear a wig known as a sheitel. Ravital proudly covers her hair with a sheitel.
More examplesFewer examplesShe found it hard to digest the fact that she would have to wear a sheitel after the wedding.Many Ashkenazi Jews wear sheitels, and some wear a covering on top of the sheitel.Where is her sheitel, the wig of the pious married woman?The word sheitel is related to the German word for parting.
